EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-30 Tackling the Modern IT Ecosystem.ES-2019-01-16 Invite 1.Whole Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: Tackle the Modern Ecosystem
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/utm_campaign=70157000001j5AEAAY]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, You are invited to join Director of Technical Marketing, Eric Wright, as he demonstrates how to tackle the complexity in the modern IT ecosystem that has grown beyond human scale to manage on Wednesday, January 30th at 11am ET.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/]]>
In this live webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-tackling-ecosystem/utm_campaign=70157000001j5AEAAY]]>, you will learn how to overcome 6 industry trending challenges in today's rapidly growing on-premises, public cloud, or containerized environments - to unleash agility, innovate faster, and stay ahead of your competition. I hope to see you there, Alex Hesterberg SVP and Chief Customer Officer, Turbonomic
